Record.ClassificationPath: Nervous System Diseases/Autonomic Nervous System Diseases/Primary Dysautonomias/Orthostatic Intolerance/Postural Orthostatic Tachycardia Syndrome
Record.Description: A syndrome of ORTHOSTATIC INTOLERANCE combined with excessive upright TACHYCARDIA, and usually without associated ORTHOSTATIC HYPOTENSION. All variants have in common an excessively reduced venous return to the heart (central HYPOVOLEMIA) while upright.
